commit message:
Merge tag '1.0.45' into develop

1.0.45
Module 'app' renamed to 'xabber'
Gradle and android libraries versions updated.
TLSUtils.acceptAllCertificates and disableHostnameVerificationForTlsCertificicates used to disable security certificate checks.
Private MUC chats disabled until better implementation.
ContactItemInflater: contact elevation added via XML layout. contact_list_item: elevation value taken from dimens.
RoomChat: 'delivery reports' for MUC.
RoomChat: room invitation message do not shown in MUC.
VCardManager: fixed vCard requests on roster load.
Avatar hash now send with presence stanzas.
Smack version updated to 4.1.4
Improved avatar hash sending in presence stanzas (XEP-0153)
First implementation of HTTP file upload (XEP-0363)
Version 1.0.46 (code 219)

Better implementation of HTTP file upload - temp 'file messages' with progress bar.
Upload errors processed - resend available.
Version 1.0.47 (code 220)
Messages containing file links now parsed and could be downloaded and cached.
Version 1.0.48 (code 221)
Forgotten icon resource added.
MimeUtils removed (MimeTypeMap used)
Images now  shown in chat (URL containing images parsed and downloaded).
File size and download progess shown in chat near the message timestamp.
MessageItem: 'isFileMessage' renamed to 'isUploadFileMessage'
ChatMessageAdapter: click on image causes view intent.
Chat: 'open' and 'save' actions for file messages.
Chat: file size requested before download.
Chat: specific TextView for filenames (with autolink and emoticons disabled)
Connection settings: 'load images' options added.
Version 1.0.50 (code 223)
Saved files registered in DownloadManager
HTTP File Upload namespace changed according to XEP-0363
HttpFileUploadManager: connection timeout set to default.
new FileManager take response for file messages operations.
Send images copied to cache directory.
Comment to file saved to download changed to 'Received by ' application short name.
'Could not get path to file' error added.

New images now downloaded only for incoming messages.
Images for  messages loaded from DB downloads after chat opening,
FileManager stores set of started downloads.
Merge branch 'feature/file_upload' into develop

Swedish and Turkish translations added. Other translations updated.
crowdin.bash script updated ('app' renamed to 'xabber')
Version 1.0.51 (code 224)

Merge branch 'release/1.0.51'

Conflicts:
xabber/MemorizingTrustManager
xabber/otr4j
